title: Wordpress Class One

 general - setting: - title, tagline changing concept: setting saved in options table in database  video 04 youtube resource link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TnTM4Q0NdQ4.

 Dicussion - setting: pingback, allow comments, comments related setting like emailing when comment, comments approval, user avatar plugins - installing wp user avatar plugin for adding user defined default avatar in wordpress comment  video 06 youtube resource link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XlVkGvihc.

 Plugin installed through downloading / manual installing - wp-content>plugins>extract plugin folder plugin can be edited in dashboard.
